product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The women's Elite Bike Jersey from Pearl Izumi keeps you cool when the biking gets tough. 100% polyester fabric is powered by Ice-fil(R), providing superior skin cooling and moisture management when you sweat. UPF 50+ sun protection. Full-length zipper for customized venting on the go. 3 back pockets, including a sweat-proof pocket, store your essentials. Elasticized gripper on back edge keeps hem in place. Reflective elements make the women's Elite Bike Jersey from Pearl Izumi visible in low light.
short_description: The women's Elite Bike Jersey from Pearl Izumi keeps you cool when the biking gets tough.
